text: Hi, have you finished reading the instructions?
I believe so.
Yeah, they are pretty long! :)
I don't think I was given very long instructions? Mine seem rather short. We need to make a decision and a charity donation yes?
Yes, that's it exactly!
Okay great. What are we supposed to say about the children's charity?
I don't know if you received the information regarding the Charity, but Save the Children supports children around the world from disease, violence and provides a means to a better education.
That sounds like an admirable and important charity. What do you think?
I like it. It's a real organization, by the way.
I see that (I googled it). It's been running for quite some time. Almost one hundred years at this point.
Yes, that's true. I want to ask you if you would be interested in donating a small portion of your HIT payment to the charity.
Do you have any info on the way the charity allocates its money?
I want to say a high percentage goes directly to the children: 90%. The programs in the US are aimed at advocacy, education, emergency services and protection. Seems like a good cause...
A quick search says 86% which is certainly a good amount in my opinion.
I think so too. I guess we can donate up any amount of our task pay, from $0 to $.30. Any thoughts on what how much you might want to donate?
Okay cool. I guess I'll go with .15
Awesome! Just for your info., I will match the same amount!
Great. I'm sure any amount helps.
I think anything is better than nothing, besides, it's for a good cause!
Yeah, I agree. Sounds like a plan!
It's been great chatting with you and thanks again for the donation! Have a great weekend! :)
